abstract: The Air Force acknowledged for the first time that a computer virus has infected a network at a base in Nevada where pilots operate armed drones in the skies over Afghanistan by remote control.
snippet: The Air Force acknowledged for the first time that a computer virus has infected a network at a base in Nevada where pilots operate armed drones in the skies over Afghanistan by remote control.

headline.main: Computer Virus at U.S. Drone Fleet Base Nothing to Worry About, Air Force Says
